channel.title: 317 [Delta] Thieving stalls help
channel.description: Hi i have a server with thieving stalls that give out money, I want to make it give out gems and have a NPC near it to sell the gems to for 500k each. How will I do this?

item.title: 317 [Delta] Thieving stalls help
item.dc:creator: @john1716 john1716
item.description:
@john1716 wrote:

what if i donâ€™t have prices.txt? how will i make it so if they sell the gem to it it will cost 500k

Read full topic

item.title: 317 [Delta] Thieving stalls help
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

If your server is delta, go to your client.java thens search the stalls id. You should see something like this under it.

addItems(995, 500000) (dont remeber deltas exact item method.)

change the 995 to the gem id, then the 500000 to 1.

Then simply spawn the npc, and edit the shop in shops.cfg.

If its pi, go to src/server/model/players/actionhandler

and search the stall id and you should find this under it

The same principle applies as above when changing what you receive.

Then go to data/cfg/shops.cfg and edit the shop.

Then go to prices.txt and search the gems id and you should find a two number code.

itemid price Is the synthax you should use when changing the price.

Read full topic
